website_summaries.verdict: A premium paddleboard bag that includes a roll strap and provides plenty of built-in paddle storage.
pros: Large enough to fit everything you need for a stand up paddleboarding session
Offers four separate ways to pick up, carry, or hang up the bag
Padded shoulder straps come with an extensive adjustment range
Internal pocket at the rear of the bag keeps your paddle in a spot where it won’t dig into your back
cons: Large bag sometimes can be difficult to carry
Does not provide a separate compartment to store an inflatable pump

customer_reviews.title: Ample storage and still easily zips. I have a Tower II Adventurer board ...
customer_reviews.text: Ample storage and still easily zips. I have a Tower II Adventurer board and fit the board, my PFD, a towel, leash, all inside. I'm using the outside bungee straps for my pump. Love that it has so many ways to carry. LOVE it so far.
customer_reviews.author: carey h

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought an inflatable SUP a could of years ago. My original bag started to rip open at the seams. I bought this one to replace it. This bag is quite an improvement compared to my old bag. It has plenty of handles for multiple carrying options. The side mesh is perfect for letting the moisture out. The pocket is spacious enough for accessories and emergency kits. The main compartment is very spacious for my 11'6" board, paddle, pump, and PFD. The backpack straps are comfortable and easily adjustable. There's an optional hip belt which I haven't used yet. So far so good. It has stood the test of traveling
customer_reviews.author: Exodelisk

customer_reviews.title: Material leaves a bit to be desired
customer_reviews.text: I can't give this five stars yet. The four stars is for fit, function, and design. The bag is good size for my wife's board. We can fit the board, pump, paddle, life jacket, and a rolled up wetsuit in with some room to spare. I am however worried about durability. The material it is feels awfully thin. Almost paper'ish? Hard to explain I guess. If you packed this thing to the max I have no doubt the zippers would tear away from the fabric based on the way it feels. As for now we are happy with it. Hopefully we can get a few years out of it before it falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and design
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10.6 Tower iSup and it fits perfectly into this bag with lots of extra room for a few other things. I was able to pack the air pump, paddle, 3rd fin and leash and still have room for towels. The bag seems to be well made and the zipper is long enough to get the board in without any hassle. I chose this bag because of the size and the handles - which I didn't even realize it has 2 handles, one the one shown on the side - plus another one on the end. Perfect for me to drag it around & throw it in my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: ldvega

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag at an Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: This bag is far larger than I need for my 11 for inflatable iRocker SUP. Lots of straps that enable you to really tie down your bag for transport or to take on an airplane easily with a huge storage pocket on the front that I could use to store items like dry clothes. There is even a mesh section that helps drain water after your paddle and have your board stored in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great buy on back packs for my iSUPs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack for my 10'6" x 32" board and all accessories! It is big and strong. I ordered 2 with the zippered pocket + glad I did. The pocket is very roomy for my needs. Very quick delivery. The seller kept in touch to ensure my satisfaction with delivery, and with the bag. Photo show bag packed with; board, paddle,pump,life vest, leash, keel, anchor with room for more.
customer_reviews.author: H L Wig

customer_reviews.title: A Bag you can easily use and Trust.
customer_reviews.text: Why is it that companies always give you storage bags that are too small when you make a purchase? This was the case when I bought my SUP’s. The bags were always a frustration. Finally the zippers broke after 2 seasons. These bags by BPS are adequately large to easily and quickly place my SUP’s, pump, paddle, etc. the bags are sturdy and the zippers are great. They have back pack straps and multiple handles that make them easy to transport and store. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fun doc

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it! It was packaged just perfect from Amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE it! It was packaged just perfect from Amazon and delivered on time. I have a 10.5 foot board which fits in the bag as well as both paddles, my kayak seat, kayak foot bar, electric pump and my life jacket! I am so happy I bought this. The bag that came with the board, was hardly big enough for the board alone, much less any of the accessories and ripped the third time I used it. Thank you for a great product at a fantastic price. I would highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Large Bag So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The bag is huge and fits everything that goes with my paddleboard. Contruction seems ok. Havent really used it other than to put the board, pump, paddle, etc. into it. From what Inhave read, you cant do that with the factory bag. I will update the review as I get some use from it. Vendor sent me an email after it arrived so it seems they stand behind thier product.
customer_reviews.author: 2020DC

customer_reviews.title: Solid Well-Made Backpack for all your SUP Adventures
customer_reviews.text: Took the backpack out today. Really like how the fabric is top quality. Hopefully stitching holds as well. Ample enough room for my racing/touring 12'6" SUP plus my triple action pump and paddle, which fits nicely in separate area on the bag. Only issue I might have is would be cool to have a waist belt on the backpack so when you are packing into a remote lake, the pack might not shift around as the terrain becomes uneven. Otherwise, quite happy with the backpack so far and the company seems like a really nice bunch.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz Boudoir

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of the quality for the price, but was surprised after receiving the bag. It is of really good quality and has plenty of space for my 12'x34"x6" touring iSUP and the accessory pocket is large enough to hold a electric pump, hose, patch container with room to spare. The zippers also appear to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: ACM1057

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: I took this product on a trip to French Polynesia. A great opportunity for the product to perform and shine. The bag completely fell apart before I even got to the airport. Reaching our destination, the stitching on both sides of the bag had opened up. Carrying the bag from baggage claim to the cab, one of the shoulder straps tore out. Keep in mind that I purchased this bag to upgrade from the bag that came with our paddle board. Not a good decision on my part.
customer_reviews.author: James Gray

customer_reviews.title: Bag arrived quick and customer service is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get pack my 12' 6" board, pump, paddle, water shoes and accessories into the bag after a couple of adjustments. Bag arrived quick and customer service is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Could have been great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Unfortunately after 3 uses it already has two small holes in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle K.

customer_reviews.title: Serves the need
customer_reviews.text: Serves the purpose...10'4" SUP and all accessories fit well inside this backpack style SUP bag.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: The delivery was delayed by one day
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product actually to carry my inflatable kayak. It seems like it would be a good fit and not as bulky as some of the other bags I have found. I have yet to use it on a trip, but it looks like it I durible and should perform as expected. I will definitely update my review if any problems occur.
customer_reviews.author: misfit

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and top quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for my Tower 10'4" inflatable SUP. High quality with plenty of space for my paddle, water bottle, speaker, leash, and more. Front pocket is huge.
customer_reviews.author: Paleo guy

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement pack!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a Mission LTE inflatable pack that ripped at the seams. Although I've only had this for a few weeks now, the straps are much more comfortable and the center of gravity is lower which is much better. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CollinPMA

customer_reviews.title: Large and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my inflatable kayak, and it works perfectly. I holds the kayak, paddles, pump, and 2 life jackets! Padded shoulder straps make is comfortable to carry.
customer_reviews.author: S. Meads

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used it yet but it seems very durable and functional. It's exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Broker Mike

customer_reviews.title: Fits Tower Adventurer 2.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to hold my Tower Adventurer 2. It fits everything nicely in the bag and seems to be sturdy enough. I haven't had it out and thrown around yet, but will update if needed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Finck

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room for my Tower board and accessories. Multiple options to carry. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for SUP gear!
customer_reviews.text: Fits board, paddles, shoes, gloves and bottom fin. Room for a change of clothes if and sunblock if needed. Rugged construction and good zippers too.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Good value! Fairly sturdy. It will puncture if you drag it around but for the price it’s a great bag!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bjork

customer_reviews.title: No paddle pocket as pictured. WTH
customer_reviews.text: Does not have the paddle pocket as described and pictured.very frustrated. Chose this particular pack for the paddle pocket because the previous one did not have one.
customer_reviews.author: Leapalooza

customer_reviews.title: Size is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just received 2 of these and so far so good. Will update my review if any problems arise other wise I would recommend for sure. Very large. Will hold ALL you need it to
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bag is decent quality and works as advertised. Makes hauling my iSUP way easier.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tower SUP
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge! Great bag for my tower SUP and the pump and the paddle. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MRAgency

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and seems to be very well made....has protected storage compartment inside main body.....would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Rainbowsin Bill

customer_reviews.title: So easy to go paddling
customer_reviews.text: Can fit everything in here! So easy to go paddling!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis K. Herberg

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: I used it once and it tore at the top of the bag. Is not constructed to hold the weight of an inflatable SUP.
customer_reviews.author: hoolieboolie

customer_reviews.title: I really like the external pocket
customer_reviews.text: Fits myTower ISUP well. I really like the external pocket. Well made
customer_reviews.author: DavidL

customer_reviews.title: Nice big bag for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is well made and huge. I have enough room to add in 2 life jackets and the pump and paddle. It seems well made and the service of the company was awesome. Would reccoment this bag to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Fits the SUP better the the bag it came with.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The bag is much nicer than we were expecting. It is heavier material and the zipper/seams are all double stitched. The mesh is rubber coated which is great. We had thought to get something just to hold the inflatable SUP but this bag holds it all: board, pump, & paddle. Several carrying points. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Zager

customer_reviews.title: This bag not only fits my inflatable paddle board but ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag not only fits my inflatable paddle board but it also fits all of the accessories that go with the board such as the oar and fins.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Inflatable paddle board bag
customer_reviews.text: My paddle board, paddle and pump fit into it nicely. There is still room for my life vest and towel. It looks real durable and well made, time well tell.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie J Carrico

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s great! Fits everything I need it to with lots of extra space. It’s winter so I won’t actully use it for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY A CRAMSEY

customer_reviews.title: Not Rugged enough for air travel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this specifically to take my board to the Gulf of Mexico. First trip and the bottom seam ripped and I almost lost a segment of my paddle in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Mille140

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe how easy it was to get my isup in along with ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a must! Can't believe how easy it was to get my isup in along with everything else...
customer_reviews.author: KATSSPHOTO

customer_reviews.title: Fits Tower Adventurer 2
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Tower Adventurer 2 perfectly. The straps seem sturdy to hold up to the weight of the paddleboard.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: The storage/carry bag is just what I was looking for and at a good price point. Holds my inflatable paddle board, the paddle, pump and other miscellaneous items. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MHG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a second one for our other paddle board. Great quality for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia Kreamier

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product and fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product and fantastic customer service! The bag fit my Tower inflatable SUP perfectly. The inside pocket is great for the paddle. The back pack is easy to carry and can likely travel well! Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag is good for now.
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits in the bag, SUP, paddle, air pump with hose, Now all I need is a life vest to see if it fits just like the video shown. I will rate it again when I include the vest.
customer_reviews.author: Cade Omalza

customer_reviews.title: Product is just as described. Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product is just as described. Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.author: apmalibu

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for the Board
customer_reviews.text: Great bag with plenty of room. Need a spot for the pump and it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Daren B.

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle board bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great carry/storage bag for our inflatable paddle board. Easy to pack up and take wherever your paddle board adventures may take you!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Bps
customer_reviews.text: Excelent product for my SUP’s. Very good delivery time . 100% reccomendable
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I got two. One for an 8.5 board and another for a 10. Both fit.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Everything fit inside nicely and was easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Quality design and great workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Quality design and great workmanship. I especially appreciate the interior pocket. No more paddles falling out of a bag with only a velcro seal.......
customer_reviews.author: Cope D.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Was able to fit my SUP/accessories with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Was able to fit my SUP/accessories with room to spare, and seems very sturdy. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: deb s.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag for the price. My badfish fit with room for pump and gear.
customer_reviews.author: jesse

product_meta.title: BPS Premium Universal Inflatable Paddleboard/iSUP Bag - Easy Carry Backpack - Includes Roll Strap and Built-in Paddle Storage
feature_bullets: Grab your BPS Premium Universal iSUP bag today! Designed by an experienced paddle boarder to fit ALL inflatable paddle boards up to 12’6 in length and 34 inches in width – INCLUDING having the inflation pump rolled up ‘inside’ the board. It ALSO includes an especially designed roll strap to hold your board and pump once ‘rolled up’ - making it easier to put into your bag, and mesh panels to allow a wet board to dry.

With dimensions of 39.37" x 17.72" x 14.17”, BPS iSUP bag is large enough to fit everything you need for a SUP session. BPS have included four separate ways to pick up, carry or hang up this bag because real world tests showed how helpful and useful extra handles on the side AND the top of the bag are. Whether moving the bag within a room or garage, lifting from the ground into a vehicle, lifting up off an airport carousal – you will have the handle you need to use a good lifting technique.

Padded shoulder straps have a large adjustment range (fits a 30 inch chest easy and a 46 inch chest easily as shown in the photo); a chest strap with a large adjustment range spreads the weight even further; a padded layer between your board and your back adds real comfort; an internal pocket at the rear of the bag (with sealable Velcro) stores your paddle where it won’t dig into your back and can’t catch on anything or fall out (or scuff your board); and two heavy duty zips.

There are two variations available – one with an extra external pocket at the back – or one with the flexibility of adjustable Bungee Laces on the back of the bag. The extra external pocket is large enough to fit a towel, an XXL men’s wetsuit, a pair of wetsuit booties and a water proof phone wallet (all zipped up). To make putting your board away super easy - you will be emailed photographic instructions on how to use your new bag and strap when you purchase.

Buy with complete confidence as all our products are stored and shipped to you by Amazon and are fully guaranteed for one year so if you are not satisfied with your purchase, just let us know. Thanks for looking at a product from our store – SURF and SNOW Warehouse. We are a small family business that ONLY sells what we know and love -water sports gear. We know our products, use our products, and stand behind them 100% so if you have any questions about using any of our products please just ask.
